scripts.build-frontend: cd client && npm i && npm i node-sass && npm run build
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm i);(cd backend && npm i);
scripts.build-on-server: rm -r backend/public && rm -r backend/dist && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend && mkdir backend/public && cp -r client/build/* backend/public/
scripts.build: rm -r backend/public && NODE_ENV=production npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend && mkdir backend/public && cp -r client/build/* backend/public/
